text: The 1931-32 Austrian Football Championship was organized by the Vienna Football Association. A single-track II. League served as a substructure to the I. League. These leagues were only open to professional football clubs. SK Admira Wien became champion for the third time in club history. FC Libertas Wien was promoted to the first league for the 1932-33 season. Other federal state associations organized state championships in different modes on an amateur basis. The respective amateur national champions then also played for a champion at the amateur championship. Amateur champion became Grazer AK. ==Final table== Table mode (if points are tied): goal quotient Pl. Name M W D L P 1\. SK Admira Wien 22 14 5 3 33 2\.
